sentences.english: The guest-house is intended to supply free food to monks and the destitute.
sentences.chinese: 旅館是用來向僧侶和貧困者提供免費食物的。

sentences.english: It allows lay followers to use the practice traditionally attributed to the forest monks.
sentences.chinese: 它讓在家人可以練習這種傳統上屬於森林僧侶的修法。

sentences.english: The festival ends when the monks spray holy water on to the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 儀式以僧侶們向人羣佈施聖水爲結束。

sentences.english: As night fell, work went on by oil lamp and candlelight.
sentences.chinese: 夜幕降臨時，僧侶們點起油燈和蠟燭，繼續幹活。

sentences.english: A procession of Brahmins is coming this way.
sentences.chinese: 婆羅門僧侶的遊行隊伍向咱們這兒來了。

sentences.english: Others destined to be monastic disciples of Sri Ramakrishna came to Dakshineswar.
sentences.chinese: 其他註定要成爲僧侶的門徒來到了達克希什瓦。

sentences.english: The monk and the devotees looked wonderingly at him in his ecstatic condition.
sentences.chinese: 僧侶與奉獻者都驚訝地看到他處於一種神迷的狀態。

sentences.english: The monks then marched through the rain to another pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，僧侶冒雨前進至另一個寺塔。

sentences.english: And try not to poke your camera in the monks' faces at the traditional morning alms-giving in Luang Prabang.
sentences.chinese: 琅勃拉邦請不要在早晨給化緣的僧侶照相。

sentences.english: He strode out toward the friar, who gave him one glance and then went on eating unconcernedly .
sentences.chinese: 他走向僧侶，他看了一下，又滿不在乎繼續喫着。

sentences.english: Monks must abstain from killing living things. Therefore, monks are vegan.
sentences.chinese: 僧侶戒殺生，所以僧人是素食主義者。

sentences.english: In her grief, Elizabeth was comforted by a 16)stalwart monk called Markus.
sentences.chinese: 這時，誠篤的僧侶馬庫斯安慰哀傷的伊麗莎白。

sentences.english: Eventually the monks are imprisoned inside Rangoon's former Government Technical Institute.
sentences.chinese: 最後，僧侶們被監禁在仰光的原政府技術研究院裏。

sentences.english: In 1993 the monks of the Karma Kagyu tradition had a candidate of their own choice.
sentences.chinese: 1993年噶瑪噶舉派的僧侶們有了自己的候選人。

sentences.english: Monks and nuns may wear their robes in keeping with their respective traditions.
sentences.chinese: 出家僧侶需要穿僧袍保持優良傳統。

sentences.english: The very word austerity has been spoilt by the monks, by the sannyasis, by the hermits.
sentences.chinese: 簡樸這個詞被僧侶們，遁世者，隱士們，破壞了。

definition: Nara period (710-794) in early Japanese history
Heian period (794-1185), period of Japanese history
to formally call on/to worship (a God)/to pay homage to sb
volumes of classics/volumes of scriptures/ancient scrolls
monk (Sanskrit: Sramana, originally refers to north India)/Buddhist monk
to supply/to provide for one's elders/to support one's parents
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
honorific title for a Buddhist monk
